FuncDef:
The service-instance-group command binds a NAT instance to a service-instance-group instance group.
The undo service-instance-group command removes the binding between a NAT instance and a service-instance-group instance group.
By default, a NAT instance is bound to no service-instance-group instance group.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a service-instance-group instance group.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To bind a NAT instance to a service-instance-group instance group, run the service-instance-group command. This command helps properly transmit NAT services.
Precautions
In CGN load balancing plus inter-chassis hot backup scenarios, after running the service-instance-group command, you must run the remote-backup-service command to ensure that the two devices are simultaneously assigned IP addresses.
